mapper.sql: baseUserId, serialNo, agentSerialNo,key, companyName, industryTypeId, industryType, contactMan, postcode, prov, city, area, address, auditStatus, endTime, businessLicense, registerNumber, identityType, identityCardOn, identityCardOff, terminals, serviceType
mapper.select:
select merc.id as id, user.userName as userName, user.nickname as nickname, user.password as password, user.createdAt as createdAt, user.createdBy as createdBy, merc.phone as phone, merc.tel as tel,
from sys_merchant merc, sys_user user where merc.baseUserId = user.id and merc.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_merchant (id, baseUserId, serialNo, agentSerialNo,key, companyName, industryTypeId, industryType, contactMan, phone, tel, postcode, prov, city, area, address, auditStatus, endTime, businessLicense, registerNumber, identityType, identityCardOn, identityCardOff, terminals, serviceType ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{baseUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentSerialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{industryTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{industryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prov,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{businessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identityType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{identityCardOn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identityCardOff,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{terminals,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update sys_merchant
baseUserId = #{baseUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
serialNo = #{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
agentSerialNo = #{agentSerialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
key = #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
companyName = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
industryTypeId = #{industryTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
industryType = #{industryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contactMan = #{contactMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
postcode = #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prov = #{prov,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
auditStatus = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
endTime = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

registerNumber = #{registerNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
identityType = #{identityType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
identityCardOn = #{identityCardOn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
identityCardOff = #{identityCardOff,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
terminals = #{terminals,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
serviceType = #{serviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
